name: The 2nd World Conference on Climate Change and Global Warming
content: The 2nd World Conference on Climate Change and Global Warming (CCGCONF) offers an interdisciplinary forum for the discussion of the impact of climate change and global warming in the global context. CCGCONF will feature plenary speakers by some of the world's leading innovators, researchers, and thinkers in the field. By bringing together many of the renowned scholars, the CCGCONF 2022 ensures opportunities for growth that few other conferences can compete. The conference will be hosted by Corvinus University of Budapest. on 06 - 08 May 2022.
